movies.title: Eila, Rampe and the Baby Girl

biography.bio: Heidi Herala was born on January 10, 1960 in Helsinki, Finland as Heidi Helka Tuulikki Herala. She is an actress, known for Eila, Rampe and the Baby Girl (2014), The Swan and the Wanderer (1999) and Gloriously Wasted (2012). She has been married to Seppo Maijala since 1986. They have four children.
biography.name: Heidi Herala

biography.bio: Pirkka-Pekka Petelius was born on May 31, 1953 in Tornio, Finland. He is an actor and writer, known for Pulttibois (1989), Team Ahma (1998) and Ou Nou! (2001). He was previously married to Sari Siikander.
biography.name: Pirkka-Pekka Petelius

biography.bio: Emmi Parviainen is one of Finland's most promising and appreciated young actresses. Her first film was Aleksi Mäkelä's Esa and Vesa (1994). Since then she has had roles in TV series, several short films, and has had several successful leads in stage plays, including her roles in The Finnish National Theatre. She started her studies at the Theatre Academy Helsinki in 2008, and got her Master's degree in 2014. She is best known for her big breakthrough role in Jan Forsström's The Princess of Egypt (2013).
biography.name: Emmi Parviainen

biography.bio: Riku Nieminen was born on May 5, 1986 in Kajaani, Finland. He is an actor and writer, known for 21 Ways to Ruin a Marriage (2013), Off Key (2015) and Kanelia kainaloon, Tatu ja Patu! (2016). He is married to Annika Poijärvi.
biography.name: Riku Nieminen

biography.bio: Leena Uotila was born on June 16, 1947 in Helsinki, Finland as Leena Marjatta Uotila. She is an actress, known for Les moomins (1990), Road North (2012) and Solveigin laulu (1974). She has been married to Henri Kapulainen since 1970. They have two children.
biography.name: Leena Uotila

biography.bio: Eila Roine was born on November 26, 1931 in Turku, Finland as Eila Orvokki Roine. She is an actress, known for Heikki ja Kaija (1961), Vaimonsa mies (2001) and Rintamäkeläiset (1972). She was previously married to Vili Auvinen.
biography.name: Eila Roine

biography.bio: Pirkko Hämäläinen was born on May 29, 1959 in Helsinki, Finland as Pirkko Päivikki Hämäläinen. She is an actress and writer, known for Les indignes (1982), Le menteur (1981) and The Fence (2001). She is married to Puntti Valtonen. They have two children.
biography.name: Pirkko Hämäläinen

biography.bio: Åsa Wallenius is an actress, known for Eila, Rampe and the Baby Girl (2014), Avsked (2010) and Fling (2004).
biography.name: Åsa Wallenius

biography.bio: Carl-Kristian Rundman was born on December 7, 1960 in Helsinki, Finland. He is an actor and composer, known for Puhtaat valkeat lakanat (1993), Easy Living (2009) and Rage (1990). He has been married to Niina Nurminen since 1991. They have two children.
biography.name: Carl-Kristian Rundman

biography.bio: Yuko Takeda is an actor, known for Eila, Rampe and the Baby Girl (2014).
biography.name: Yuko Takeda
